Summary: Huge perfect triangle, one or two red lights in corner, lots of white lights
divs: sighting detailshello, my name is jeff wong and im from the uk. i had my first pretty close encounter with a triangular ufo. i had just left junction 17 prestwich\whitefield in manchester to go to preston at approx. 11.50pm on 16th march 2010. i looked through my drivers side window towards the purple sky and noticed an unusually bright light, like a torch shining into my direction. there was also a smaller light some miles behind it in the near distance, which i can see blipping aircraft lights. i will explain more about this further down. i ignored it at first thinking it was a light from a plane or helicopter. but as i was near junction 15, i can see that it was a huge perfect triangle shaped object with 3\4's of it lit up with many bright whitish round lights on the underside. not like automobile hid intensity lights, but powerful car fog light type. in the darker corner, i could see one or two smaller permanent red lights which do not blink. i thought it was a reflection on my window, until i wound it down, and wow! it was still there! not that high up in the sky, and it remained totally and perfectly still, in the same place almost right above me! it was not busy on the motorway, so i quickly pulled up on the hard shoulder and quickly got my camera out. as soon as i stepped out and pointed it towards the triangular object, it had simply vanished, as if it knew i had noticed it and was going to take pictures. i remained looking everywhere at the sky, it was quiet and no sign of anything? the time was approx. 11.52pm or so. i got into my car and very soon past the junction 15 sign, i then saw the smaller light coming closer towards me, which i mentioned earlier, and indeed, it was a small aircraft flying across my path on the motorway. it had the usual blipping lights on the plane and i knew it was an aircraft, but the other one was huge, definitely not a plane, stealth fighter, helicopter, 747, police helicopter or toy ufo etc..... i couldnt say how high it was, maybe 6 or 7 street lamp posts high? i do recall when i was driving on the motorway towards it, it was towards my right above eye level. i didnt have to lift my head up to see it. i just felt excited and knew to take note of important details. i have always been a ufo fan and watched all the ufo hunters series, other ufo related sites and know my aircraft shapes etc.. but i never thought i would witness one myself! regards jeff wong 37 years old
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around March 16th 2010
